metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Generic
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -enc ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -encodedcommand ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -ec '))) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -w hidden ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -window hidden ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -windowstyle hidden ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -w 1 '))) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -noni ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -noninteractive '))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

metadata.objective: False positive: Very special / sneaky PowerShell scripts Reference: Internal Research
